frame.name: Foreign_or_domestic_country
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Current_country</fen> is identified as matching or not matching the instance of the <fen>Discourse_salient_country</fen>.
<ex><t><fex name="cur">Foreign</fex></t> sales account for only 20% of IBM's income .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Constituent_parts
FE.definition: <def-root>The materials or <fen>Constituent_parts</fen> that make up the <fen>Current_country</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location that the <fen>Current_country</fen> is a part of.
</def-root>

FE.name: Current_country
FE.definition:
<def-root>The country or countries that the speaker is indicating in the current instance, which may match or be distinct from the <fen>Discourse_salient_country</fen>.
<ex>AutoPartsPlace.com offers discount prices on millions of import auto parts, <fex name="cur"><t>domestic</t></fex> car parts, and car accessories. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root>ULTIMATELY TO BE REPLACED BY MULTIWORD TARGETS (in almost all cases). This FE is used for the Names of Locales.
</def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition:
<def-root>A place that the <fen>Current_country</fen> is located with respect to.
</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description, characteristic, or property of the <fen>Current_country</fen> which is not covered by more specific FEs. </def-root>

FE.name: Population
FE.definition:
<def-root>The people living in the jurisdiction of the locale.
</def-root>

FE.name: Discourse_salient_country
FE.definition: <def-root>The country that has been featured in the discourse, or that the speaker/hearer identify with or are located in; it serves to identify the <fen>Current_country</fen> by specifying it as the same or different. This FE is incorporated in the targets of this frame.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: foreign.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: dealing with or relating to other countries.

lexUnit.name: domestic.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: existing or occurring within a country.

lexUnit.name: international.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: of multiple nations, especially excluding the current one.
